FuncDef: This command dumps various internal IKE statistics for the specified scope:

ParaDef.Info: Dumps information about the name of the IPsec GW, up to 32 characters.
Dumps information about the IP address and port of the peer for dynamic tunneling.
Dumps information about the specified ISA. Values-slot/mda.
Dumps the name of the static LAN-to-LAN tunnel, up to 32 characters.
